name: Ext_R4_Endpoint_connectionType
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Endpoint.connectionType for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Endpoint.connectionType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Protocol/Profile/Standard to be used with this endpoint connection
element.definition: A coded value that represents the technical details of the usage of this endpoint, such as what WSDLs should be used in what way. (e.g. XDS.b/DICOM/cds-hook).
element.comment: `Endpoint.connectionType` maps to R5 `Endpoint.connectionType`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
